@eduardoboucas Nice! This is the approach I took on one of my projects. A @gulp build running on @Netlify turns @contentful content into HTML and JSON APIs for client renders. Works beautifully. https://t.co/OKSq3DTRhA @jekyllrb & @GoHugoIO both offer output formats which could give this.
